remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含中的物件控制項。The contains the objects in a control. 您可以擷取此類別透過控制項的執行個體屬性。You can retrieve an instance of this class through the control property. 集合會維護透過控制項的參考屬性。The collection maintains a reference to the control through the property. 為了改善效能，包含共用和非共用的資料列。To improve performance, a includes shared and unshared rows. 共用的資料列共用記憶體來降低成本的大型記錄集。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該將共用的資料列盡可能小心。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載加入為基礎的資料列的。The overload adds rows that are based on the of the . 新的資料列會共用的話。The new row is shared, if possible. 務必在指定的資料列屬性可共用及最佳的延展性。Be sure that the row specified in the property can be shared for best scalability. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 您也可以在呼叫方法中的排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會加入為基礎的資料列的。The method adds rows that are based on the of the . 新的資料列會共用的話。The new row is shared, if possible. 務必在指定的資料列屬性可共用及最佳的延展性。Be sure that the row specified in the property can be shared for best scalability. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 您也可以在呼叫方法中的排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將共用的資料列如果可能。The method adds shared rows to the , if possible. 否則，新的資料列會取消共用。Otherwise, the new rows are unshared. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 您也可以在呼叫方法中的排序資料列，在使用者修改資料格時的事件處理常式。You might also want to call the method in a event handler to sort the rows when the user modifies a cell. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為一個錯誤，方法可讓您的應用程式停止回應是否與索引的任何資料列大於`rowIndex`已選取。Due to a bug, the method will make your application stop responding if any rows with an index greater than `rowIndex` are selected. 若要解決這個問題，您必須取消選取這些資料列之前呼叫這個方法，並重新選取資料列之後。To work around this bug, you must cancel the selection of these rows before calling this method, and reselect the rows afterward. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法插入的資料列之前選取的資料列，若要暫時解決 bug < 備註 > 一節所示。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to insert rows before selected rows to work around the bug indicated in the Remarks section.
